message: Let's start with this fair offer, Bob.  A 70/30 split seems reasonable considering the inflation we're facing.
Your offer was unfair considering the rapid devaluation of your share. I propose a 60/40 split. Take it or leave it.
That's a significant shift in your favor, Bob.  Let's see what the next round brings.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but my position weakens faster. This is my final offer above 50%.
